modName: Harkons Vampiric Sword - Upgraded and remodeled version of Harkons Sword
summary: Changes the appearance of Harkon's Sword to match that of Holugar's Vampiric Sword mod (not required).
descriptionHtml:
Feel as though Harkon's Sword is little more than a weak sword with an unimpressive appearence? This mod is for you. Harkon's Sword has been changed to appear unique. Its stats have also been upgraded; the sword itself now is as powerful as a glass sword, and the enchantment has more uses.

There are two versions of this mod:
- Regular: The sword's texture is changed, the sword is upgraded, and the enchantment has more uses.
- No Vampire: Same as regular, except the enchantment on the sword should work regardless of whether or not you are a vampire.

Can be installed via Nexus Mod Manager or extraction of the files to the data folder. To uninstall manually, remove the ESP file and the weapons/vampiricsword directories within data/meshes and data/textures.

[b]Kudos to Holugar for allowing me to use the mesh and texture from his [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22041]Vampiric Sword mod[/url]; I claim no credit for it.[/b]

Other recommended vampire related mods:
 - [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25852]Lustmord Vampire Armor[/url] (Depicted in the screenshots)
 - [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/9717]Better Vampires[/url]
author: tobiasmar
